1.0.name: wordpress/orders
1.0.description:
This is old version.

Actual new working revision of this plugin here

This wordpress plugin is show all old and present aproved and pending bookings from Booking Calendar. Professional version can make export to CSV, print bookings and have advanced filters for orders.

This plugin is extremely easy to use and very flexible, built with full Ajax and jQuery support.

You can test live demo of Customers & Orders support plugin. ( Admin Panel )
